summary.span: 实现文本控件要求的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality required by text controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类实现中的文本操作控件的核心功能，如和。This class implements the core features of text manipulation controls, such as and . 其中包括文本选择**剪贴板**功能、 多行文本框控件支持和很多事件。These include text selection, **Clipboard** functionality, multiline text control support, and many events. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用，派生类中，以创建多行带垂直滚动条的控件。The following code example uses , a derived class, to create a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 此示例还使用， ，和属性，以使多行文本框控件可用于创建文本文档。This example also uses the , , and properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在多行文本框控件中按 Tab 键时，是否在控件中键入一个 Tab 字符，而不是按选项卡的顺序将焦点移动到下一个控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pressing the TAB key in a multiline text box control types a TAB character in the control instead of moving the focus to the next control in the tab order.

value.span: 如果用户可以使用 Tab 键在多行文本框控件中输入 Tab 字符，则为 ；如果按 Tab 键移动焦点，则为 。

span.span: if users can enter tabs in a multiline text box using the TAB key; if pressing the TAB key moves the focus.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性还必须是`true`控件中获取一个 TAB 字符。The property must also be `true` to get a TAB character in the control. 如果属性设置为`true`，用户必须按 CTRL + TAB 将焦点移动到下一个控件的 tab 键顺序。If the property is set to `true`, the user must press CTRL+TAB to move the focus to the next control in the tab order. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用，派生类中，以创建多行带垂直滚动条的控件。The following code example uses , a derived class, to create a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 此示例还使用， ，和属性，以使多行文本框控件可用于创建文本文档。This example also uses the , , and properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents. remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此方法将文本添加到而不是使用串联运算符 （+） 将文本串联起来控件中的现有文本到属性。You can use this method to add text to the existing text in the control instead of using the concatenation operator (+) to concatenate text to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法和属性将文本从一个复制到另一个。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method and the property to copy text from one to another. 此示例要求将两个控件名为，`textBox1`和`textBox2`，已添加到窗体，`textBox1`具有文本分配给其属性。This example requires that two controls named, `textBox1` and `textBox2`, have been added to a form and that `textBox1` has text assigned to its property. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当更改分配给控件的字体时，是否自动调整控件的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the height of the control automatically adjusts when the font assigned to the control is changed.

value.span: 如果在更改字体时自动调整控件的高度，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the height of the control automatically adjusts when the font is changed; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你将设置属性`true`为，当更改，会扩大或缩小以容纳更大或更小的文本。When you set the property to `true` for a , when the changes, the expands or contracts the to accommodate the larger or smaller text. 的不会更改。The of the does not change. 如果你想要更改控件的大小，在用户输入文本时，你可以使用控件，并使用其事件来更改其大小。If you want to change the size of the control as the user enters text, you can use a control and use its event to change its size. ## Examples 此示例假定你具有的窗体具有两个文本框中，两个按钮，并为每个按钮单击事件。This example assumes that you have a form with two text boxes, two buttons, and click events for each of the buttons. 示例演示了属性设置为`true`一个文本框和`false`其他。The example demonstrates the property by setting it to `true` for one text box and `false` for the other. 单击一个按钮时文本框中将填入较小的文本，并单击其他按钮时文本框中将填入较大的文本。When you click one button the text boxes are filled with a smaller text, and when you click the other button the text boxes are filled with larger text. 包含文本框设置为`true`将增加高度以适应较大的文本。The text box that has set to `true` expands in height to accommodate the larger text. 宽度不会更改。The width does not change. remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性可以更改要到窗体的配色方案混合的文本控件的背景色。You can use the property to change the background color of the text control to blend into the color scheme of your forms. 若要更改控件中的文本的颜色，请使用属性。To change the color of the text within the control, use the property. 设置时属性的文本控件，请确保您所选的颜色不会导致要消失的控件的文本。When setting the property of your text control, ensure that the color you choose does not cause the text of the control to disappear. 例如，如果和属性都设置为`Color.Black`，文本框控件中的文本将不可见。For example, if the and properties are both set to `Color.Black`, the text within your textbox control will not be visible. 此属性可能会通过替代如果属性设置为`true`。This property might be over ridden if the property of the is set to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用要创建无边框和平面风格的控件，除了默认的三维控件属性。You can use the property to create borderless and flat style controls, in addition to the default three-dimensional control. > [!NOTE] > 派生的类中， ，不支持`BorderStyle.FixedSingle`样式。The derived class, , does not support the `BorderStyle.FixedSingle` style. 此样式将导致使用`BorderStyle.Fixed3D`改为样式。This style will cause the to use the `BorderStyle.Fixed3D` style instead. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用，派生类中，以创建可以正确显示文本 20 点 Arial 使用一个边框的文本框。The following code example uses , a derived class, to create a text box that can properly display text using 20-point Arial with a single border. 此示例使用属性以确定后字体的相应控件的高度和已分配给该控件。This example uses the property to determine the appropriate height of the control after the font and have been assigned to the control. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示用户在文本框控件中能否撤消前一操作。

span.span: if the user can undo the previous operation performed in a text box control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此方法返回`true`，可以调用方法来撤消文本框中的上一个操作。If this method returns `true`, you can call the method to undo the last operation in a text box. 你可以使用此方法在事件，或在管理的按钮的状态的代码中启用或禁用撤消文本框控件中的上一操作的能力。You can use this method in the event of a , or in code that manages the state of buttons on a to enable or disable the ability to undo the previous operation in a text box control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用，派生类。The following code example uses , a derived class. 它提供了事件处理程序对象执行剪切、 复制、 粘贴和撤消操作。It provides event handlers for objects that perform Cut, Copy, Paste, and Undo operations. 此示例需要控件名为`textBox1`已创建。This example requires that a control named `textBox1` has been created. summary.span: 从文本框控件中清除所有文本。

span.span: Clears all text from the text box control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此方法清除而不是分配控件的内容属性为空字符串。You can use this method to clear the contents of the control instead of assigning the property an empty string. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用，派生类中，以创建的事件处理程序事件。The following code example uses , a derived class, to create an event handler for the event. 在事件处理程序内的代码将数据限制为数字。The code within the event handler restricts data to numbers. 已在控件中输入文本后，代码将确定是否输入的文本是一个数字。After text has been entered in the control, the code determines if the text entered is a number. 如果文本不是数字，则代码将清除从控件文本和显示来警告用户接受数字。If the text is not a number, the code clears the text from the control and a is displayed to alert the user that only numbers are accepted. 该示例需要`Boolean`变量名为`flag`和控件称为`textBox1`外部此方法定义。The example requires that a `Boolean` variable named `flag` and a control called `textBox1` are defined outside of this method. 此示例演示如何使用标志变量来避免中的级联事件事件。This example demonstrates how to use a flag variable to avoid a cascading event in the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性可以更改以匹配窗体上其他控件的文本控件中的文本的颜色。You can use the property to change the color of the text within the control to match the text of other controls on your form. 你还可以使用此属性以突出显示一个特定的文本框包含无效值。You can also use this property to highlight a specific text box that contains an invalid value. 若要更改控件的背景色，请使用属性。To change the background color of the control, use the property. 设置时属性的文本控件，请确保您所选的颜色不会导致要消失的控件的文本。When setting the property of your text control, ensure that the color you choose does not cause the text of the control to disappear. 例如，如果和属性都设置为`Color.Black`，文本框控件中的文本将不可见。For example, if the and properties are both set to `Color.Black`, the text within your textbox control will not be visible. 此属性可能会通过替代如果属性设置为`true`。This property might be over ridden if the property of the is set to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在指定位置`pt`控件中指定的点到距离最近的字符串的第一个字符的工作区以外的参数是`pt`返回。If the location specified in the `pt` parameter is outside the client area of the control, the first character of the string closest to the point specified in `pt` is returned. 可以使用此方法来确定哪些字符位于控件内的特定点附近。You can use this method to determine which characters are located near a specific point within the control. 然后可以使用此值在该位置的文本上执行操作。You can then use this value to perform operations on the text at that location. > [!NOTE] > 如果中的指定的位置`pt`参数位于控件中指定的点到距离最近的字符串的最后一个字符的工作区右侧`pt`返回。If the specified location in the `pt` parameter is located on the right side of the client area of the control, the last character of the string closest to the point specified in `pt` is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回与指定的位置最接近的字符索引`pt`参数。This method returns the character index that is closest to the position specified in the `pt` parameter. 字符索引是文本的在控件中，包括空格中的从零开始索引。The character index is a zero-based index of text in the control, including spaces. 此方法可用于确定在文本中用户在其上将鼠标放将鼠标坐标传递给此方法。You can use this method to determine where in the text the user has the mouse over by passing the mouse coordinates to this method. 这很有用，如果你想要在用户将鼠标指针停留在该控件的文本中的单词时执行任务。This can be useful if you want to perform tasks when the user rests the mouse pointer over a word in the text of the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果指定的位置不在该控件的客户端矩形内，或不在控件中的最后一个字符，返回值是最后一个字符的索引。If the specified location is not within the client rectangle of the control, or is beyond the last character in the control, the return value is the index of the last character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从零开始的行号在文本框中。Line numbering in the text box starts at zero. 如果`lineNumber`参数大于在文本框中的最后一行返回-1。If the `lineNumber` parameter is greater than the last line in the text box, returns -1. 返回物理行的第一个字符索引。 returns the first character index of a physical line. 物理行是显示的行中，不是分配行。The physical line is the displayed line, not the assigned line. 显示的行数可以大于由于自动换行分配行数。The number of displayed lines can be greater than the number of assigned lines due to word wrap. 例如，如果分配到两个长行控件并设置和到`true`，两个已分配的长行产生四个物理 （或显示行）。For example, if you assign two long lines to a control and set and to `true`, the two long assigned lines result in four physical (or displayed lines).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于确定基于中指定的字符索引的行号`index`的方法参数。This method enables you to determine the line number based on the character index specified in the `index` parameter of the method. 控件中的文本的第一行返回值零。The first line of text in the control returns the value zero. 方法返回的物理行号的索引的字符所在的位置在控件内。The method returns the physical line number where the indexed character is located within the control. 例如，如果第一个逻辑行中的文本的一部分控件换行到下一行，方法返回 1，如果指定的字符索引处的字符已经换行到第二个物理行。For example, if a portion of the first logical line of text in the control wraps to the next line, the method returns 1 if the character at the specified character index has wrapped to the second physical line. 如果设置为`false`、 行的任何部分被换到下一行，并且该方法返回对指定的字符索引为 0。If is set to `false`, no portion of the line wraps to the next, and the method returns 0 for the specified character index. 此方法可用于确定哪一行是位于特定的字符索引。You can use this method to determine which line a specific character index is located within. 例如，在调用方法来搜索的文本，你可以获取到找到搜索结果的字符索引。For example, after calling the method to search for text, you can obtain the character index to where the search results are found. 你可以调用此方法返回的字符索引与找不到方法，以确定其行单词。You can call this method with the character index returned by the method to determine which line the word was found. > [!NOTE] > 如果在中指定的字符索引`index`参数为超出可用的控件内包含的行数，则返回最后一个行号。If the character index specified in the `index` parameter is beyond the available number of lines contained within the control, the last line number is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组中的每个元素将成为在文本框控件中文本的行。Each element in the array becomes a line of text in the text box control. 如果文本框控件的属性设置为`true`和换行字符的文本中出现，换行字符后面的文本是添加到数组中的新元素，并显示在单独一行上。If the property of the text box control is set to `true` and a newline character appears in the text, the text following the newline character is added to a new element in the array and displayed on a separate line. > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下，行的集合是中的行的只读副本。By default, the collection of lines is a read-only copy of the lines in the . 若要获取的行可写的集合，请使用类似于以下代码： `textBox1.Lines = new string[] { "abcd" };`To get a writable collection of lines, use code similar to the following: `textBox1.Lines = new string[] { "abcd" };` ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用，派生类中，以从多行文本框控件中提取的文本的所有字符串并将它们显示使用方法。The following code example uses , a derived class, to extract all strings of text from a multiline text box control and displays them using the method. 此示例需要已创建控件，名为`textBox1`，并且已使用的文本行填充它。This example requires that a control has been created, named `textBox1`, and that it has been filled with lines of text. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性，以限制为如邮政编码和电话号码的值输入控件中的文本的长度或将输入数据时要输入在数据库中的文本的长度限制。You can use this property to restrict the length of text entered in the control for values such as postal codes and telephone numbers, or to restrict the length of text entered when the data is to be entered in a database. 你可以限制到数据库中的对应字段的最大长度文本框控件中输入的文本。You can limit the text entered into the control to the maximum length of the corresponding field in the database. > [!NOTE] > 在代码中，你可以设置的值属性的长度大于指定的值的值属性。In code, you can set the value of the property to a value that has a length greater than the value specified by the property. 此属性仅影响在运行时文本框控件中输入的文本。This property only affects text entered into the control at run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类中， ，以创建用来接受密码的文本框。The following code example uses the derived class, , to create a text box that is used to accept a password. 此示例使用属性以更改所有字符类型化为大写和属性将密码长度限制为八个字符。This example uses the property to change all characters typed to uppercase and the property to restrict the password length to eight characters. 此示例还使用属性到中心中的密码控件。This example also uses the property to center the password in the control. value.span: 如果控件的内容被修改了，则为 ，否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于确定用户是否已修改文本框控件的内容。You can use this property to determine if the user has modified the contents of the text box control. 此外可以在代码中以指示进行了更改到文本框控件由应用程序设置此属性。You can also set this property in code to indicate that changes were made to the text box control by the application. 此属性可以验证和数据保存方法，用于确定如果以便可以验证所更改的内容，或将其保存在一个文本框控件中进行了更改。This property can be used by validation and data-saving methods to determine if changes were made in a text box control so the changed contents can be validated or saved. 如果你更改属性以编程方式，属性将恢复为`false`。If you change the property programmatically, the property reverts to `false`. 这不会引发事件。This does not raise the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件，派生类中，以确定的内容控件填充数据后进行了修改控件。The following code example uses the event for a , a derived class, to determine if the contents of the control have changed since the control was filled with data. 该示例使用一个字符串来存储控件的原始内容并将其与内容比较以确定其内容已经更改。The example uses a string to store the original contents of the control and compares it against the contents of the to determine if the contents have changed. 如果内容已更改，属性设置为`true`。If the contents have changed, the property is set to `true`. 否则，它将重置为`false`。Otherwise, it is reset to `false`. 此示例需要控件名为`textBox1`已创建且`String`变量名为`originalText`已经创建，以存储的原始文本控件。This example requires that a control named `textBox1` has been created and that a `String` variable named `originalText` has been created to store the original text for the control. [!code-cpp[Classic TextBoxBase.Modified Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBoxBase.Modified Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBoxBase.Modified Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBoxBase.Modified Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBoxBase.Modified Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBoxBase.Modified Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示它是否为多行文本框控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a multiline text box control.

value.span: 如果该控件是多行文本框控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control is a multiline text box control; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多行文本框中，可在控件中显示的文本的多个行。A multiline text box allows you to display more than one line of text in the control. 如果属性设置为`true`，多行文本框中输入的文本换行到下一行控件中。If the property is set to `true`, text entered into the multiline text box is wrapped to the next line in the control. 如果属性设置为`false`，直到输入换行字符输入到多行文本框控件的文本将显示在同一行。If the property is set to `false`, text entered into the multiline text box control will be displayed on the same line until a newline character is entered. 以下可用作换行字符：The following can be used as newline characters: - - ControlChars.CrLfControlChars.CrLf - vbCrLf (仅限 Visual Basic)vbCrLf (Visual Basic only) 你可以将滚动条添加到文本中使用属性显示水平和/或垂直滚动条。You can add scroll bars to a text box using the property to display horizontal and/or vertical scroll bars. 这允许用户滚动控件的尺寸超出的文本。This allows the user to scroll through the text that extends beyond the dimensions of the control. > [!NOTE] > 因为的默认值属性是`false`的默认大小将会根据字体大小，即使您调整。Because the default value of the property is `false`, the default size of a will be in accordance with the font size even if you resize the . 若要获取的一致大小你，将其属性`true`。To get a consistent size for your , set its property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 在日语操作系统，如果属性设置为`true`，则设置属性将显示的文本密码，从而危及系统安全。On Japanese operating systems, if the property is set to `true`, setting the property will display the text of the password, thus compromising system security. 因此，在日语操作系统上设置属性`false`如果你设置属性。Therefore, on Japanese operating systems, set the property to `false` if you set the property. > [!NOTE] > 此属性设置为`false`默认情况下，所有派生类中，除控件。This property is set to `false` by default for all derived classes, with the exception of the control. 有关控件，属性会影响是否控件将自动调整大小，，如下所示：For a control, the property affects whether or not the control will automatically resize, as follows: - 如果设置为`true`和设置为`true`，不会自动调整大小。If is set to `true` and is set to `true`, will not automatically resize. - 如果设置为`true`和设置为`false`，将自动调整大小。If is set to `true` and is set to `false`, will automatically resize. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用，派生类中，以创建多行带垂直滚动条的控件。The following code example uses , a derived class, to create a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 此示例还使用， ，和属性，以使多行文本框控件可用于创建文本文档。This example also uses the , , and properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法仅将文本粘贴到控件中当前存储文本如果**剪贴板**。The method will only paste text into the control if text is currently stored in the **Clipboard**. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用，派生类。The following code example uses , a derived class. 它提供了事件处理程序对象执行剪切、 复制、 粘贴和撤消操作。It provides event handlers for objects that perform Cut, Copy, Paste, and Undo operations. 此示例需要控件名为`textBox1`已创建。This example requires that a control named `textBox1` has been created. summary.span: 将控件内容滚动到当前插入符号位置。

span.span: Scrolls the contents of the control to the current caret position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可滚动控件的内容，直到将脱字号插入控件的可见区域内。This method enables you to scroll the contents of the control until the caret is within the visible region of the control. 如果脱字号位于下方的控件的可见区域方法将滚动控件的内容，直到插入符号可见底部的控件。If the caret is positioned below the visible region of the control, the method will scroll the contents of the control until the caret is visible at the bottom of the control. 如果脱字号位于控件的可见区域的上方，此方法将滚动控件的内容，直到插入符号可见控件顶部。If the caret is positioned above the visible region of the control, this method scrolls the contents of the control until the caret is visible at the top of the control. 可以使用此方法在多行文本框中，以确保当前文本入口点是该控件的可见区域内。You can use this method in a multiline text box to ensure that the current text entry point is within the visible region of the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果该控件没有焦点或已在控件的可见区域中放置插入符号，则此方法无效。This method has no effect if the control does not have focus or if the caret is already positioned in the visible region of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用枚举和方法以确保文本插入点，由插入符号，表示始终屏幕上可见后按 ENTER 键。The following code example demonstrates how to use the enumeration and the method to ensure that the text insertion point, represented by the caret, is always visible on the screen after the ENTER key has been pressed. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在窗体包含控件称为`TextBox1`和控件称为`RichTextBox1`。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a control called `TextBox1` and a control called `RichTextBox1`. 此示例需要已经与相关联的事件处理方法事件。This example requires that the event-handling method has been associated with the event. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBaseScrolling#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBaseScrolling/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBaseScrolling#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBaseScrolling/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBaseScrolling#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBaseScrolling/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你想要设置为控件的文本中的第一个字符的起始位置，设置`start`参数设为 0。If you want to set the start position to the first character in the control's text, set the `start` parameter to 0. 你可以使用此方法以选择子字符串的文本，例如，当整个控件的文本搜索和替换信息。You can use this method to select a substring of text, such as when searching through the text of the control and replacing information. > [!NOTE] > 你可以以编程方式移动插入符号在文本框内通过设置`start`到想要移动到设置脱字号的文本框内的位置参数`length`为零 (0) 值的参数。You can programmatically move the caret within the text box by setting the `start` parameter to the position within the text box where you want the caret to move to and set the `length` parameter to a value of zero (0). 文本框中必须具有顺序情况下，为要移动插入符号的焦点。The text box must have focus in order for the caret to be moved. > [!NOTE] > 如果不带任何参数调用此方法，则使用一种替代方法。If this method is called without any parameters, an alternative method is used. 此备用方法继承自类。This alternative method inherits from the class. 调用时，它将输入的焦点设置到控件，并选择控件的内容。When called, it sets the input focus to the control and selects the contents of the control. 有关更多信息，请参见 方法。For more information, see the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用，派生类中，以搜索单词"fox"的实例控件的内容。The following code example uses , a derived class, to search the contents of the control for the instance of the word "fox". 如果找到，该代码选择单词在控件中使用方法。If found, the code selects the word in the control using the method. 此示例需要名为`textBox1`已创建并将其属性包含句子"The quick brown fox 将跳过只懒狗中"。This example requires that a named `textBox1` has been created and its property contains the sentence "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog." remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件中不选择任何文本，则此属性指示的插入点或插入符号，新的文本。If no text is selected in the control, this property indicates the insertion point, or caret, for new text. 如果将此属性设置为控件中文本的长度超出位置，则将最后一个字符后放置在选择开始位置。If you set this property to a location beyond the length of the text in the control, the selection start position will be placed after the last character. 在文本框控件中选定文本，更改此属性可能会降低的值属性。When text is selected in the text box control, changing this property might decrease the value of the property. 如果位置之后控件中的剩余文本由属性小于的值属性、 的值属性会自动减小。If the remaining text in the control after the position indicated by the property is less than the value of the property, the value of the property is automatically decreased. 值属性永远不会导致增加属性。The value of the property never causes an increase in the property. 你可以以编程方式移动所选内容在文本框内通过设置和属性。You can programmatically move the selection within the text box by setting the and the properties. 你可以以编程方式移动插入符号在文本框内通过设置到想要移动到设置脱字号的文本框内的位置属性的值为零 (0)。You can programmatically move the caret within the text box by setting the to the position within the text box where you want the caret to move to and set the property to a value of zero (0). 必须具有焦点的选定内容或脱字号移动。The must have focus in order for the selection or the caret to be moved. 你可以设置属性即通过给予第一个。You can set the property of a that is by giving it the first. ## Examples **示例 1****Example 1** 下面的代码示例使用，派生类。The following code example uses , a derived class. 它提供了事件处理程序对象执行剪切、 复制、 粘贴和撤消操作。It provides event handlers for objects that perform Cut, Copy, Paste, and Undo operations. 此示例需要控件名为`textBox1`已创建。This example requires that a control named `textBox1` has been created. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用属性来设置边界，如果属性是`true`和属性是`false`。The control uses the property to set the bounds if the property is `true` and the property is `false`. 通常情况下，对应于中未包括的边界的参数`specified`参数将传递使用其当前值。Typically, the parameters that correspond to the bounds not included in the `specified` parameter are passed in with their current values. 例如， ， ，或或属性可以随对控件的当前实例的引用传递属性。For example, the , , or the or properties of the property can be passed in with a reference to the current instance of the control. 但是遵守并应用于控件中传递的所有值。However all values passed in are honored and applied to the control. `specified`参数表示元素的控件更改你的应用程序。The `specified` parameter represents the elements of the controls changed by your application. 例如，如果你更改的控件，`specified`参数值是`Size`值。For example, if you change the of the control, the `specified` parameter value is the `Size` value of . 但是，如果在响应中调整要设置属性`specified`参数值是`None`值。However, if the is adjusted in response to the property being set, the `specified` parameter value is the `None` value of .
